title: E-Commerce Dashboard
img_alt: E-commerce analytics dashboard with colorful charts and metrics
description: A responsive dashboard for e-commerce businesses with real-time analytics, inventory management, and sales forecasting.

content.text: This dashboard provides e-commerce businesses with powerful analytics tools to track sales, monitor inventory, and forecast future trends. Built with React and TypeScript, it offers a responsive and intuitive interface for businesses of all sizes.

items: Real-time sales analytics with customizable date ranges
Sales forecasting using machine learning algorithms
Responsive design for desktop and mobile devices

content.text: The dashboard is built with a modern React architecture using TypeScript for type safety. Data visualization is handled through D3.js, providing interactive and customizable charts. The UI is styled with Tailwind CSS for a clean, responsive design that adapts to any screen size.

One of the main challenges was optimizing the dashboard for performance with large datasets. We implemented data virtualization and lazy loading techniques to ensure smooth performance even with thousands of records.

title: Task Management App
img_alt: Task management application with kanban board interface
description: A collaborative task management application with kanban boards, time tracking, and team collaboration features.

content.text: This task management application helps teams organize work, track progress, and collaborate effectively. With features like kanban boards, time tracking, and real-time updates, it streamlines workflow for remote and in-office teams.

items: Drag-and-drop kanban boards for visual task management
Team collaboration with comments and file attachments
Progressive Web App for offline functionality

title: Personal Finance Tracker
img_alt: Personal finance application showing expense tracking and budgeting features
description: A comprehensive personal finance application for tracking expenses, managing budgets, and setting financial goals.

content.text: This personal finance tracker helps users manage their money more effectively through intuitive expense tracking, budget management, and financial goal setting. Available on both mobile and web platforms.

items: Automated expense categorization using machine learning
Budget creation and tracking with visual indicators
Financial goal setting with progress tracking
Secure bank account integration via Plaid API
